comment.brief: the page instances are never reused
comment.full: the page instances are never reused

comment.brief: any inactive pages may be used
comment.full: any inactive pages may be used

comment.brief: any page, even the current one in replace mode
comment.full: any page, even the current one in replace mode

comment.brief: any page can be reused, even the current one
comment.full: any page can be reused, even the current one

comment.brief: Specifies when a page can be reused in navigation, either with the same, or a different parameter. Only pages of the same type are ever reused. Reusing pages avoids the overhead of instantiating new objects and/or adding new items to the UI tree.
comment.full:
Specifies when a page can be reused in navigation, either with the same, or a different parameter. Only pages of the same type are ever reused. Reusing pages avoids the overhead of instantiating new objects and/or adding new items to the UI tree.

The default is `Inactive`.

This can be overridden for individual pages using the `Navigator.Reuse` property on the page.

This property affects template pages only. Non-templates are always reused.
